languages.text: "Если Лорд-капитану будет угодно наблюдать, то я и мои люди почтем это за честь".
"Should the Lord Captain wish to monitor the investigation, my people and I would consider it an honour."
languages.original_text: "Если Лорд-капитану будет угодно наблюдать, то я и мои люди почтем это за честь".

traits.locale_text: "Should the Lord Captain wish to monitor the investigation, my people and I will consider it an honour."
"Should the Lord Captain wish to monitor the investigation, my people and I will consider it an honour."

languages.text: «Si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán desea monitorizar la investigación, mis guardias y yo lo consideraríamos un honor».
languages.original_text: "Should the Lord Captain wish to monitor the investigation, my people and I would consider it an honour."

traits.locale_text: «Si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán desea monitorizar la investigación, mis guardias y yo lo consideraríamos un honor».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンが調査の指揮を取りたいとご希望されるのであれば、私どもにとってこれほど名誉なことはございません」
languages.original_text: "Should the Lord Captain wish to monitor the investigation, my people and I would consider it an honour."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンが調査の指揮を取りたいとご希望されるのであれば、私どもにとってこれほど名誉なことはございません」

languages.text: “如果舰长大人您愿意监督调查，我和我的人都会无比荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "Should the Lord Captain wish to monitor the investigation, my people and I would consider it an honour."

traits.locale_text: “如果舰长大人您愿意监督调查，我和我的人都会无比荣幸。”

languages.text: "Sollte der Lord Captain die Untersuchung beaufsichtigen wollen, wäre das für meine Leute und mich eine Ehre."
languages.original_text: "Should the Lord Captain wish to monitor the investigation, my people and I would consider it an honour."

traits.locale_text: "Sollte der Lord Captain die Untersuchung beaufsichtigen wollen, wäre das für meine Leute und mich eine Ehre."

languages.text: « Ce serait un honneur pour mes hommes et moi que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} supervise l'enquête. »
languages.original_text: "Should the Lord Captain wish to monitor the investigation, my people and I would consider it an honour."

traits.locale_text: « Ce serait un honneur pour mes hommes et moi que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} supervise l'enquête. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan incelemeyi takip etmek isterse yanımdakiler ve ben, bunu bir onur olarak değerlendiririz."
languages.original_text: "Should the Lord Captain wish to monitor the investigation, my people and I would consider it an honour."
